channel.title: steampunk on Red Ambassador

item.title: Time
item.description: Time has a very unique sound. It’s probably best described as an electronic / steam-punk track. Time starts out very soft and innocent, with sounds of industry (trains and machine squeaks) in the background. The chorus gets hard and heavy, grinding out the melody. The second and third choruses, the lead comes in, releasing rich melodies to complete the whole theme. You can listen to “Time” on some common platforms linked below, or you may choose to buy the track, name your price (i.
